text: David was told, “Ahithophel15:31. Ahithophel, David's advisor, was Eliam's father according to 23:34, who in turn was the father of Bathsheba (11:3). This would surely have been a factor in Ahithophel joining Absalom's rebellion. is one of the people conspiring with Absalom.” So David prayed, “Lord, please make Ahithophel's advice worthless.”
